meanings.definition: A state of extreme nervousness or panic.
meanings.sent1: She got the abdabs before her big presentation.
meanings.sent2: The loud noise gave him the abdabs.
meanings.sent3: The abdabs hit her when she realized she forgot her phone at home.
meanings.sent4: The abdabs crept up on him like a shadow in the night.
meanings.sent5: The abdabs felt like a swarm of bees buzzing in her stomach.

meanings.definition: To cause someone to become extremely nervous or panicked.
meanings.sent2: His scary prank really abdabsed his friend.
meanings.sent3: He decided to abdabs his sister by jumping out and yelling 'Boo!'
meanings.sent4: The horror movie abdabsed her to the point of tears.
meanings.sent5: The sudden thunderstorm abdabsed the entire group of hikers.
